Package index

All functions

bcd()
Calculates the box-counting dimension of a polygon
count_cells()
Counts the number of grid cells required to cover the shape polygon
find_max_extent()
Rotates geometry so that maximum possible extent lies along x-axis
import_SVD()
Import Spatial Vector Data
import_sf()
Wrapper for `sf::st_read()“
overlay_grid()
Create grids for polygons supplied as arguments
rotate_about_centroid()
Rotate sf geometry about its centroid
x_extent()
Calculate extent along x-axis
y_extent()
Calculate extent along y-axis
